item.description:
I am planning another Valentine's Day Party at my house on Friday, February 12, 2010. Please bring an appetizer or some food to share with everyone. BYOB. I will provide my house, plates, cups, etc. I want Steve C. to bring his Karokee machine. I think it will be fun to do that.

Wear your red and plan on having a good time.

Hope to see everyone there!!!!!!

Antoinette

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Second Annual Valentine Party at Antoinette's House
